__e: Sometimes this idea can be the smallest thing in the world, a little flame that you hunch over and cup with your hand and pray will not be extinguished by all the storm that howls about it.
That's strange! The weather man didn't say anything about thunderstorms in windowless basements.
Everywhere else, governments command, scream, shout, but here it just has to ask people politely to stay away and they do.
You know, except for their ice storms, which they have now.
And the mother of all blizzards is about to arrive.
Well, of course, we have had our little, what would you say, storms from time to time.
But life, I find, is often more about the storms than the peace they seek to overwhelm.
Rain over a dry desert has really caused a lot of problems,: I one of the biggest storms we've seen over the past few years.:
But there are some storms that stir the world so about, that when they have passed, things can never be set back quite as they were.
